ygData.subject: Sometimes they come back
ygData.msgSnippet: I wrote a long post, but just as I was sending it off my computer shut off and lost the email. I was rather pissed at the time and do believe I have probly

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

       I wrote a long post, but just as I was sending it off my computer shut 
off and lost the email. I was rather pissed at the time and do believe I have 
probly broken my mouse.
       Also, I claim Quickstrike and Quasar.

       Megatron looked at the tiny bot enter the Ice Cave. He seemed to 
twitch with unbelieveable fright. Quickatrike had just left, without barely 
any word at all. He was a deserter, and there was no place in the Predacons 
for deserters. Kitkat had learned that, in a way.
       The fuzor made his way up to Megatron and Inferno. Megatron was just 
going over a battle plan with the ant, but pushed it aside and focused 
himself on the small bot.
       "Ah, you grace us with your presence Quickstrike, yes." He said with a 
crule grin forming on his purple enraged face. "Do forgive me, we would have 
thrown a party knowing you'd be home so soon."
       Quickstrike said nothing. He felt absolutely mortified at the thought 
of crawling back to his boss, like a weak maximal. He couldnt even look at 
him in the eyes. "Boss, Im sorry. I dont reckon I intended to cause such an 
uproar-"
       "-Well you did you like mutant! Because of you we almost were 
destroyed in battle. While you were off, galavanting around like some tree 
hugging, drug enduced hippie, we were in the midsts of battle!" He roared, 
sending some of the Predacons retreating into darker corners of the caves.
       Quickstrike looked up at the menace which now loomed over him like a 
Decepticon. Megatron looked down at him with bruning hatred. Slowly, he 
regained his posture. "A punishment will be inflicted for this crime."
       Before he could argue, an energon knife slipped in between his 
shoulder blades. He thrashed violently to the floor, and mech flew from his 
mouth and nose like a bloody sneeze. He used both arms to try and grasp the 
knife, but couldnt reach it. As he yelled in pain, Megatron laughed in a deep 
bellow.
       "After the coma that is sure to follow, you will learn a new meaning 
for respect and loyaly...even if I have to beat it out of you." And then 
turned on one heel and left Quickstrike to spasm on the floor.

       Hell Beast peeked out of the massive iron door. He looked at Shockwave 
and gave a brief smile. Coughing he ushered him inside. "Please, come in. Im 
so sorry to keep you waiting."


--part1_8f.5dee6cd.279e2093_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
